name: @lit-protocol/e2e
description: Lit Protocol E2E testing package for running comprehensive integration tests

scripts.build: bun run build:cjs && bun run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format cjs --target node --external '@lit-protocol/*'
scripts.build:esm: mkdir -p dist-esm && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist-esm --format esm --target node --external '@lit-protocol/*' && mv dist-esm/index.js dist/index.mjs && rm -rf dist-esm

author: Lit Protocol
